original_title: Keppel Road: The Life and Music of the Bee Gees
overview: This documentary traces the lives of Gibb brothers and takes a look through their memories, creating some of the greatest hits in the world as the Bee Gees.  Including interviews, archive footage, and new versions of classic songs - all recorded in the lead up to the release of their 'Still Waters' album in 1997.
title: Keppel Road: The Life and Music of the Bee Gees
